attributes.action: PLEASE tell us that taxpayers will not pick up the bill for McBlair and McBroon attending the Mandela Memorial.
attributes.additional_details: These two criminals should be in prison for the damage they did to this country.  Taxpayers should certainly NOT be paying for them to travel ANYWHERE, let alone somewhere where they purport to represent the people they tried so desperately to destroy.  They DO NOT represent us and we DO NOT want to be picking up their travel cost bill.
